trans-unit.source: By using the built-in WaitFor\* resources (WaitForAll, WaitForAny, and WaitForSome), you can now specify dependencies across computers during configuration runs, without external orchestration.
trans-unit.target: 使用內建 WaitFor\* 資源 (WaitForAll、WaitForAny 和 WaitForSome)，您現在可以於設定執行期間在電腦之間指定相依性，而不需要外部協調流程期間。

trans-unit.source: The behavior or each WaitFor\* resource is:
trans-unit.target: 此行為或每個 WaitFor\* 資源為︰

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">WaitForAll</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> Waits for the specified resource to be in the desired state on <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">All</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> target nodes defined in the NodeName property.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">WaitForAll</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> 在 NodeName 屬性中定義的<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">所有</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">目標節點上，等候指定的資源轉變為預期狀態。

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">WaitForAny</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> Waits for the specified resource to be in the desired state on <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">Any</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> target node defined in the NodeName property.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">WaitForAny</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> 在 NodeName 屬性中定義的<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">任何</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">目標節點上，等候指定的資源轉變為預期狀態。

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">WaitForSome</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> Waits for the specified resource to be in the desired state on specific number, defined by the property NodeCount, of target nodes defined in the NodeName property.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">WaitForSome</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> 在 NodeName 屬性中定義的特定數目 (該數目由屬性 NodeCount 所定義) 目標節點上，等候指定的資源轉變為預期狀態。

trans-unit.source: These resources provide node-to-node synchronization by using CIM connections over the WS-Man protocol.
trans-unit.target: 這些資源會透過使用 WS-Man 通訊協定的 CIM 連線提供節點對節點同步處理。

trans-unit.source: By using these resources, a configuration can wait for another computer’s specific resource state to change before it continues with its own configuration.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用這些資源，設定可以等候另一部電腦特定的資源狀態變更，再繼續執行它自己的設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the following configuration, the target node is waiting for the <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">xADDomain</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> resource to finish on the <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">MyDC</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> node with a few retries, before the target node can join the domain.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在下列設定中，目標節點正在等候 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">xADDomain</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> 資源在 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">MyDC</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> 節點上完成幾次重試，之後目標節點才能加入網域。

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Hint:</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> By default the WaitFor\* resources try one time and then fail so although it is not required, you will typically want to specify a retry interval and count.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">提示︰</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">WaitFor\* 資源預設為嘗試一次後失敗，所以雖然並非必要，但您通常會想要指定重試間隔和計數。
